IranTrainsFemaleNinjasAsAssassins.name: Iran trains female ninjas as assassins
IranTrainsFemaleNinjasAsAssassins.summary: Three thousand Iranian women being trained as ninja warriors say they will use their martial arts skills to defend the country if necessary.

IranianNinjas...Yes,TheyDoExist.name: Iranian Ninjas ... Yes, They Do Exist
IranianNinjas...Yes,TheyDoExist.summary: Ninjutsu, the ancient Japanese martial art, finds a new home in Iran. This gjevideos documentary showcases the practice among Iranian women, blending traditional techniques with modern life. Explore the cultural fusion and personal journeys of those learning this unique self-defense art.

KageNoMichiInAction-Ktla5.name: Kage No Michi In Action - KTLA 5
KageNoMichiInAction-Ktla5.summary: Three of our teenage students were victims of an attempted mugging near the Del Amo Mall in Torrance, CA. Even though there were five muggers that were older and bigger, our students were able to defend themselves using their training when things took a turn for the worse. The muggers fled the scene after being fought off and were later caught by police.
